New Records: Quentin Grimes set a new career-high in scoring 20 points in the third quarter.
Key Match Events: Dallas Mavericks lost 134-122 to the Cleveland Cavaliers
Evan Mobley did whatever he wanted on the court
Quentin Grimes scored 20 points in the third quarter
Post-Match Reflections: The Mavericks have now lost four straight games
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was never felt as close as the final score may have indicated
Cleveland was up by 27 midway through the third quarter
Others: Jason Kidd's rotation decision was interesting
Spencer Dinwiddie has been very hot and cold all season
